author: Special Correspondent
text:
Deputy Superintendent of Police, Directorate of Vigilance and Anti-Corruption, S.V. Bargunam, has been selected for President’s medal for his meritorious service.

Joining police service in 1987 as Sub-Inspector of Police, Mr. Bargunam was promoted as Inspector of Police in 2000 and served as SB-CID Inspector in Virudhunagar district and Inspector, SB-CID, Tirunelveli rural. Moreover, he has also served in almost all police stations in Tirunelveli city.

On being promoted as DSP in 2013, he was posted in the Economic Offences Wing, Tirunelveli, and later was shifted to the DVAC, Tirunelveli.
title: President’s medal for DSP
